instruction: Connect the 'Self-Attention' block to the 'Add & Norm #1' block.
input_xml:
<mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="input" value="Input
Embeddings" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="40" y="100" width="130" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="embeddings" value="Token + Pos
Embedding" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="200" y="100" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="mha" value="Self-Attention
(MHA)" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="400" y="100" width="160" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="norm1" value="Add & Norm #1" style="rectangle" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="580" y="100" width="150" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e0" edge="1" source="input" target="embeddings" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="e1" edge="1" source="embeddings" target="mha" style="endArrow=block" parent="1"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
output_xml: ><mxGraphModel><root><mxCell id='0'/><mxCell id='1' parent='0'/><mxCell id='i1' value='i1' style='ellipse;fillColor=#FFF9C4' vertex='1' parent='1'><mxGeometry x='40' y='80' width='50' height='30' as='geometry'/></mxCell><mxCell id='h1' value='h1' style='ellipse;fillColor=#BBDEFB' vertex='1' parent='1'><mxGeometry x='100' y='40' width='50' height='30' as='geometry'/></mxCell><mxCell id='o1' value='o1' style='ellipse;fillColor=#FFD54F' vertex='1' parent='1'><mxGeometry x='200' y='60' width='50' height='30' as='geometry'/></mxCell><mxCell id='e1' edge='1' source='i1' target='h1' parent='1'><mxGeometry relative='1' as='geometry'/></mxCell><mxCell id='e2' edge='1' source='h1' target='o1' parent='1'><mxGeometry relative='1' as='geometry'/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel></diagram></mxfile>
